LanguageData.ABSPolymer.label: ABS Polymer
LanguageData.ABSPolymer.description: Organic ABS Polymer made from refined chemfuel, wood or organics.
LanguageData.ABSPolymerWeave.label: ABS Polymer Weave
LanguageData.ABSPolymerWeave.description: A cloth-like material made of ABS Polymer fibers. Quite tough.
LanguageData.ReinforcedABSPolymerWeave.label: Reinforced ABS Polymer Weave
LanguageData.ReinforcedABSPolymerWeave.description: A cloth-like material made of ABS Polymer fibers and steel. Extremely tough.
